entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Greenstone (Geraldton)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:46 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -13.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Geraldton Airport 08:06 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -13.8°C
Pressure: 100.2 kPa
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -23
Dewpoint: -16.1°C
Wind: N 22 km/h gust 42 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
